title: Click
short_plot_summary: A busy architect finds a universal remote that allows him to fast-forward, rewind, and pause his life. But soon, he realizes the remote is controlling him, causing him to re-evaluate his priorities.
explanation: A button, representing the magical remote control Michael Newman discovers
A dog, symbolizing the family's pet named Sundance
Fast-forward symbol, reflecting how Michael uses the remote to speed up parts of his life
A family, highlighting the importance of Michael's relationships with his wife and kids
A house, indicating family's where Michael learns the most important lessons of his life
